lead_paragraph: Glenn Myernick, 51, an assistant for the United States men’s soccer team and a former coach of Major League Soccer’s Colorado Rapids, was in intensive care in Thornton, Colo., yesterday after having a heart attack Thursday. Myernick had not regained consciousness as of last night, said Bob Contiguglia, the former United States Soccer Federation president.
